ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Instrument vs. melee attacks
ygData.msgSnippet: Last night in the DB room I was weaving FFC+CoFr+Psalm (too lazy to swap instruments).  The warrior in the group kept asking me where my weapons were, lol :)
ygData.messageBody:
Last night in the DB room I was weaving FFC+CoFr+Psalm (too lazy to swap
instruments). The warrior in the group kept asking me where my weapons
were, lol :)

Rokenn

> -----Original Message-----
> From: kim@... [mailto:kim@...]
> Sent: Thursday, April 06, 2000 12:47 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] Instrument vs. melee attacks
>
<snip>
> On a whim, I tried FCC+CoFl+CoFr+CoC on one seafury, switching
> instruments. I managed to steal it from my friends who were
> grouped (L38 bard, L35 cleric, L43 monk w/ FBSS, L44
> enchanter). My calculated damage was 221 damage/6 sec = 36.8
> damage/sec for that configuration. Obscene. :)
>
> --
> John H. Kim
> kim@...
